sentences.en: Changing your hairstyle can take ten years off you.
sentences.cn: 换换发型能让你年轻10岁。

sentences.en: Do you like my new hairstyle?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢我的新发型 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't worry about my hair. Just worry about your own tight hairstyle.
sentences.cn: 别担心我的头发. 为你的发型担心吧.

sentences.en: Her hairstyle exaggerates the roundness of her face.
sentences.cn: 她的发式使她的脸形显得更圆.

sentences.en: His strange new hairstyle was the cause of much merriment.
sentences.cn: 他那新奇的发式成为笑柄.

sentences.en: I had new clothes, a new hairstyle — the whole caboodle.
sentences.cn: 我身穿新衣服, 头理新发型,焕然一新.

sentences.en: I think her new short hairstyle looks simply great.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她新剪的短发看上去真是太美了。

sentences.en: It's time for me to change my hairstyle.
My hairstyle hasn't changed much since I was five.
sentences.cn: 从5岁起，我的发型就一直没怎么变。

sentences.en: That new hairstyle really does something / a lot for her.
sentences.cn: 那种新的发式的确使她好看一些[好看多了].

sentences.en: These high winds are playing the devil with my new hairstyle.
sentences.cn: 这阵强风吹乱了我的发型.

sentences.en: This hairstyle is after [ in ] the fashion.
To be candid, I don't like your hairstyle.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说, 我不喜欢你的发式.

sentences.en: What hairstyle do you feel will be best on me?
sentences.cn: 你认为我留什么发式最合适?

sentences.en: What hairstyle do you feel will look Best on me?
sentences.cn: 你觉得什么样的发型看起来最适合我?

trans.tran_en: the style in which someone’s hair has been cut or shaped
